programme.title: Selah Sue @ Festival Culturebox
programme.desc: Belgian singer-songwriter Selah Sue performed at La Cigale in Paris as part of the digital Culturebox Festival 2020. The singer released her million-selling debut album "Selah Sue" in March 2011, featuring her popular single "Raggamuffin" and her duet "Please" with American hip-hop artist Cee Lo Green. Months after its release, Selah was presented with a European Border Breakers Award (EBBA), for her cross-border success. At La Cigale in 2020, Selah Sue is accompanied by Joachim Saerens on keyboard and Simon Lenski on cello, opening her concert with a jazzed-up So This Is Love, a romantic ballad from Walt Disneys film Cinderella.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Lucibela, comes from the island of Sao Nicolau. Her assured, warm voice is shaped by years of assimilation to the sounds of morna and coladeira.

programme.title: jazzahead! 2023 interview
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: jazzahead! 2023
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2023, jazzahead! paid special attention to Germanys jazz scene and invited thirty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. Among the artists presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2023 is Belgian-Japanese piano wizard Alex Koo. In his brand new Etudes for Piano, composed for and commissioned by BOZAR Brussels, he shows how his passion for jazz and classical music merge perfectly, like a marriage between Debussy, Chopin, Reich, and Rachmaninov on the one hand, and Keith Jarrett, Craig Taborn, Brian Eno, and Philip Glass on the other.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2022, jazzahead! paid special attention to Canadas jazz scene and invited forty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. Among the performing artists is Audrey Ochoa, a top-notch Canadian trombonist. Ochoas music is exhilarating and exuberant, relevant and light-hearted. This rising star on the international music scene is decidedly captivating and original, and her compositional skill and talent on her instrument are spectacular.

programme.title: STUFF. live at BIRD Rotterdam
programme.desc: Rotterdams BIRD is a club, cafe, and restaurant with a live music program thats deeply rooted in jazz, soul, funk, hip-hop, and electronic. Its name BIRD refers to the nickname of legendary New York jazz saxophonist, bebop co-founder Charlie Parker. BIRD serves Neapolitan pizzas, fine wines, no-nonsense beers, and an all-round metropolitan rawness. Since 2014, this urban jazz club and DJAZZ.tv have been collaborating for a series of music programs: BIRD.tv, allowing you to experience the best BIRD concerts and interviews as from a first-row seat! Discover an irresistible live act; STUFF is full of unflagging energy. The Belgian band was founded in 2012 when drummer Lander Gyselinck was asked to play live music between DJ sets at a local bar. He gathered a bunch of friends, who also were musicians. The band could be considered an avant-garde jazz band who play a mix of funk, hip-hop, and electro. Andrew Claes (saxophone), Dries Laheye (bass guitar), Lander Gyselinck (drums), Mixmonster Menno (samples), and Joris Caluwaerts (keyboards) share an exceptional connection in music. They take over every stage and melt the hearts of music lovers.

programme.title: Jack DeJohnettes Special Edition at Estival 1985
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. Jack DeJohnette, an important figure in jazz fusion, was inducted into the Modern Drummer Hall of Fame in 2007. His style combines elements of jazz, free jazz, world music and R and B, and his versatility makes him a regarded and in-demand drummer. Discover his unique style as part of this breathtaking performance delivered at Estival.

programme.title: Don Cherrys "Multikulti"
programme.desc: Trumpeter Don Cherry was a musician of great versatility, creating an endless variety of styles and influencing generations of musicians. Multikulti presents a never-before heard mixture of international sounds, from mainstream jazz to reggae, in his first collaboration with the amazing Peter Apfelbaum, one of the most in-demand performers at jazz festivals all over the world.

programme.title: William Sahel - GREVE Studio, Berlin
programme.desc: Guitarist and vocalist Willy Sahel was born in Ndjamena, Chad. He mixes traditional rhythms with soul, jazz and gospel, singing in his mother tongue and eight other languages. His quartet performs melodic, harmonious and groovy music at Greve Studios in Berlin, with an extraordinary energy that draws the listener into his universe from the moment he hits the first note. Sahel is joined by keyboardist Adebambo Akinwale, ukelele and electric bass player Noriaki Hosoya, and drummer Rafat Muhammad.

programme.title: Jacques Kuba Seguin
programme.sub-title: Jacques Kuba Seguin: Letude des Lueurs
programme.desc: Trumpeter Jacques Kuba Seguins ensemble unites some of Montreals most expressive musicians: apart from Jacques Kuba Seguin, double bassist Frederic Alarie, pianist Jonathan Cayer, and drummer Kevin Warren deliver subtle but strong lyrical moments, that make it hard not to be touched by the musical bond of this group. The experience of their "Litania Projekt" seems to stop time for an instant. Together with his expressive musicians, Jacques presents a program that swings between modernity and tradition.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: November Music
programme.desc: November Music in s-Hertogenbosch has been the Dutch festival for contemporary new music since 1993. The festival offers a great combination of contemporary compositions and experimental pop, sound art, non-Western music, jazz, and improvised music. The closing concert of the 2016 edition is a good example of this musicals richness, hereby the fantastic young trio of composer and pianist Rembrandt Frerichs play together with Cello8ctet Amsterdam and renowned Iranian tar player Hossein Alizâdeh. Dutch pianist Rembrandt Frerichs studied in New York and lived in Cairo for several years. His music has the drive of American jazz and the lyricism of Eastern music, interspersed with recognizable elements from the chamber music of Claude Debussy and Maurice Ravel. The combination of Frerichs with the Cello8ctet and Alizâdeh is unique, as their music is a miracle of organic creativity, a perfectioned example of fusion between music from the old and the new world.

programme.title: Saluzzi, Mariano and Dauner live in Stuttgart
programme.desc: Dino Saluzzi, one of Argentinas tango music masters, has been building his legacy since the mid-1980s. His accordion-like bandoneon defines Argentinas tango music. Saluzzi has explored many paths—paths along which he has rarely travelled more than once, despite some common threads. This rare, vibrant and intense performance is an intimate collaboration with Charlie Mariano (saxophone) and Wolfgang Dauner (piano) and features music ranging from tango and classical music to international favorites.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.sub-title: Paradox Live: Jeroen van Vliet Moon Trio
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In the TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the amazing Dutch pianist Jeroen van Vliet.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Aretha Franklin
programme.sub-title: Aretha Franklin: A trip in Paris
programme.desc: Live Recording at the Palais Des Sports from 1977. Aretha Franklin performs songs like Respect, You make me feel like a natural woman, "La vie en Rose" and Singing in the Rain.

programme.title: Estival Jazz Lugano
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. This performance of Brazilian Tania Maria promises to make you want to dance. The singer, composer and pianist sets fire to the Estival scene with her pop and jazzy song, magnificently put forward on samba, bossa-nova, Afro-Latin and jazz fusion tunes.

programme.title: BIRDtv
programme.desc: Rotterdams BIRD is a club, cafe, and restaurant with a live music program thats deeply rooted in jazz, soul, funk, hip-hop, and electronic. Its name BIRD refers to the nickname of legendary New York jazz saxophonist, bebop co-founder Charlie Parker. BIRD serves Neapolitan pizzas, fine wines, no-nonsense beers, and an all-round metropolitan rawness. Since 2014, this urban jazz club and DJAZZ.tv have been collaborating for a series of music programs: BIRD.tv, allowing you to experience the best BIRD concerts and interviews as from a first-row seat! This episode is dedicated to seven brothers from the south side of Chicago: The Hypnotic Brass Ensemble AKA Bad Boys of Jazz, Tha Bros, and Yo Favorite Band! The band freely adds generous doses of hip-hop, soul, and funk to the brass band tradition, creating an intoxicating and boisterous blend: perfect for another episode of BIRD.tv!

programme.title: Tony Bennett
programme.desc: Relive the magic of one of the most beloved crooners in music history in his prime: Tony Bennett! Recorded live in Londons Royal Albert Hall on March 2, 1974, this enchanting performance showcases Bennetts remarkable vocal prowess and charisma to full effect. Bennett is accompanied by his musical director Torrie Zito and an orchestra of British musicians that includes Kenny Clare (drums), Don Lusher (trombone), and Kenny Baker (trumpet). Tune in for Bennetts captivating take on songs "The Good Things in Life", "My Favorite Things", "My Love", "Ive Got Five Dollars", "It Dont Mean a Thing", and "Maybe This Time" in this magical concert recording.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Jim Hall and Atilla Zoller - Extensions
programme.desc: This selection of unforgettable performances by some of the most iconic and influential jazz guitarists in history showcases these legends unique essence. Revel in Wes Montgomerys virtuosity as he performs the captivating "Nicas Dream" in Holland in 1965, and delight in the expressive beauty of his rendition of "Heres That Rainy Day", recorded in London in that same year. Experience the timeless appeal of Joe Passs "You Stepped Out of a Dream" and "You Turned The Tables on Me", recorded live in Hanover in 1975. The interplay between Jim Hall and Atilla Zoller borders on the impossible as they perform "Extensions" in Hanover in 1973. Enjoy Jim Halls lyrical solo performance of "Im Getting Sentimental Over You" from 1964. Witness Sonny Sharrocks avant-garde fusion of jazz and rock in an exhilarating performance of "Peanut", recorded live in France in 1970. Sharrock is joined by flutist Herbie Mann in a soulful performance of "Memphis Underground" from 1969. Immerse yourself in the magic of jazz guitar!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Face au public
programme.desc: No early breakthrough rock and roll artist is more important to the development of the genre than Chuck Berry (1926-2017). Influenced by jazz and rhythm and blues, he was rock and rolls greatest songwriter, the main shaper of its instrumental voice, one of its greatest guitarists, and one of its greatest performers. In this 1965 Face au Public TV episode, Chuck Berry plays a string of hit songs, including his 1956 smash hit "Roll Over Beethoven", "Promised Land" and "Johnny B. Goode". Chuck cuts loose on guitar and the conservative crowd finally gets it.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In their TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the amazing Dutch jazzband BRUUT led by saxophone player Maarten Hoogenhuis!

programme.title: On Piano
programme.desc: Jazz first gained a foothold on Latvian soil in the 1920s. A century onward, this documentary traces the first two decades of jazz in Latvia in this portrait of Jack Michalicky, the first known Latvian jazz pianist. Michalicky was a musician from head to toe - a gifted violinist, he truly felt at home at the piano. Slender and lithe, the imaginative pianists fingers flew across the keys like a true miracle. Seemingly indefatigable, Michalicky would play improvised solos during breaks in the bands sets, if the patrons wished. This brief yet insightful documentary, which places this remarkable musician in the context of post-WWI jazz in Europe, was produced by Latvian Mareks Ameriks.

programme.title: Jazz à Ramatuelle
programme.desc: Antonio Faraò features prominently in the rich group of talented Italian pianists. He is the winner of the 1998 prestigious Concours Martial Solal, awarded by Herbie Hancock, and he has made his mark as a player of elegance and lyricism. This has allowed him to collaborate with the best European and American musicians. In his album Evan, recorded in the USA, he leads an all-star band, notably starring Joe Lovano on tenor. In this particular recording at Jazz à Ramatuelle, he appears at the Theatre de Verdure in the company of another sax legend - Dave Liebman, a musician of unfailing generosity and himself the repository of more than 40 years of modern jazz history. With refined ballads and feline groove, this meeting sparkles, perhaps even lighting up some new stars in the night above Ramatuelle.

programme.title: Coleman Hawkins live in Belgium, 1962
programme.desc: A jazz festival named after the inventor of the instrument most associated with the genre, Adolphe Sax, would be incomplete without the man who laid the groundwork for how the instrument is played today. This must have been the reasoning of the organizers of the Festival International de Jazz Adolphe Sax in Dinant, Belgium, when they invited tenor saxophone giant Coleman Hawkins to perform there in June 1962. Appearing with a group that includes the French pianist George Arvanitas, one-time Duke Ellington bassist Jimmy Woode, and expat drummer Kansas Fields, the musician also known as "Bean" and "Hawk" serves up an hour-long set of familiar standards bookended by Hank Jones "Chant" and J. J. Johnsons "Wee Dot".

programme.title: Tribute to Django Reinhardt
programme.sub-title: Tribute to Django Reinhardt: Rosenberg meets Beets
programme.desc: World-class Dutch jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson, and John Clayton. His mother a music teacher and his father an Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey enthusiast, Beets was surrounded by music from an early age. And though music was in their blood, neither parent associated the word "musician" with a career. In this broadcast, Peter Beets teams up with gipsy jazz heros Stochelo Rosenberg, Martin Limberger and Frans van Geest. The strength and precision of Van Geests rhythms and tempo, and the ease with which Stochelos lead guitar soars above them, make this band a cohesive collective - unique in their renditions of standards, Djangos classic compositions, and original tunes composed by Stochelo himself.

programme.title: Blue Note 75th Anniversary
programme.sub-title: Blue Note 75th Anniversary: Blue Note All Stars
programme.desc: Blue Note Records is arguably the most prestigious jazz label. Since its foundation in 1939, it has continued to attract young talent. To celebrate the labels 75th anniversary in 2014, young musicians formed the 2014 Blue Note All Stars and appeared at the Blue Note Jazz Festival at the Gaîte Lyrique in Paris. Pianist Robert Glasper, guitarist Lionel Loueke, virtuoso trumpeter Ambrose Akinmusire, bassist Derrick Hodge, saxophonist Marcus Strickland and drummer Kendrick Scott constituted the dream line-up. United for the concert, they played songs from their respective albums, as well as great standards revisited for the occasion and to bring you the next level of jazz!

programme.title: Jazz à Vienne
programme.desc: A number of spellbinding performances from Jazz à Vienne, a well-known Jazz Festival that takes place annually, in France. Every evening there are concerts in the ancient Roman theater of Vienne. Among the performers there have been musicians such as Miles Davis, Stan Getz, Michel Petrucciani, Ella Fitzgerald, and many more. In addition to the main concerts there are smaller ones on other stages in the city, and in pubs and musical moves.

programme.title: Jazzed Out London
programme.desc: Jazzed Out proves that a jazz session can take place anywhere. Unusual locations, such as garage buildings, multi-storey car parks, street corners, subway trains, and parks, in several of the worlds metropoles, provide the setting for brief jazz performances. The sheer rawness of the metropoles merge with the musical creations of various artists in search of the perfect urban stage. In this episode, London serves as a backdrop for sets by trumpeter Matthew Halsall, saxophonist Soweto Kinch, and pianist Neil Cowley.

programme.title: The making of Omara
programme.desc: Join us for an insightful look at the creative process of saxophonist Michael Blicher, organist Dan Hemmer, and drummer Steve Gadd as they craft the repertoire for their acclaimed 2016 album "Omara." Following in the footsteps of legendary organists like Jimmy Smith, Shirley Scott, and Jimmy McGriff, organist Dan Hemmer and his two musical peers prove that the organ trio format continues to be a force to be reckoned with in jazz and beyond. The album "Omara," recorded live during their 2016 tour of Germany, England and Denmark, captures the trios unique blend of jazz, soul, and blues in performance at some of Europes most intimate jazz clubs. Witness the passion, dedication, and inspiration that led to this wonderful album in Blicher Hemmer Gadd - The Making of "Omara".

programme.title: Les McCann
programme.sub-title: Les McCann: Live in New Orleans
programme.desc: Autodidact Les McCann became an international jazz star he is today after the release of his album "Swiss Movement" in 1968 which was recorded with Eddie Harris. However this musician has many other sides of achievements than that one record such as; McCann effortlessly switched between styles and stood his ground in every role from bop to fusion, from vocals to electric piano and clavinet to synthesizer, his is mix of church music and swing fits perfectly in the spirit of his time although at one point within the 90s he was only able to play with a single finger due to his illness. In todays broadcast, McCann brings gospel back to the New Orleans where this set was played in 1983. McCanns vocals triumph in the soulful performance of many of his hits, including Just Like Magic. He is accompanied by his fantastic "Magic Band" consisting of saxophonist Bobby Bryant Jr., bassist Curtis Roberson Jr. and drummer Tony St. James.

programme.title: The MotorMusic Jazz Sessions
programme.desc: The MotorMusic Studios in Mechelen, Belgium, attract many great musicians to the city. A wide variety of visiting international jazz musicians share their art of making jazz music with us in the DJAZZ series Belgium Sessions. In these sessions, some of Europes finest musicians perform their own, original music. New York is Jazz Heaven: small wonder that many young Belgian musicians cross the ocean to try their musical luck in the Big Apple. One of these journeymen brings the fruits of his successful New York experiences to this MotorMusic Session: tenor saxophone player Steven Delannoye and his New York Trio join forces with saxophonist Frank Vaganee. The intense and intriguing dialogue between the two saxophones recalls the golden jazz age of the 1950s, but adds a freshness of approach that is defined by their respective experiences. The horns are underpinned by the powerful NYC-based rhythm section of drummer Jesse Simpson and bassist Desmond White, who contribute a vibrant energy that propels the saxophonists to lofty heights.

programme.title: Modern Jazz Quartet - Live Concert
programme.desc: Formed in 1952 from the rhythm section of Dizzy Gillespies big band, the Modern Jazz Quartet took its inspiration from classical chamber music as well as jazzs blues roots. The group enjoyed a decades-long career with multiple critically acclaimed albums, cementing their place in the history of the genre. Following concerts in Rotterdam and Amsterdam the days before, the Modern Jazz Quartet performed at Singer Concertzaal in Laren for Dutch TV on March 31, 1969. Composed of Milt Jackson on vibraphone, John Lewis on piano, Percy Heath on bass, and Connie Kay on drums, the foursome plays with elegance and style.

programme.title: Bayerischer Hof Night Club
programme.sub-title: Bayerischer Hof Night Club: Gonzalo Rubalcaba Trio
programme.desc: The Cuban pianist, composer and bandleader Gonzalo Rubalcaba is a star name on todays international jazz scene. Technically dazzling and brilliantly creative, Rubalcaba generates infectious excitement with his music. He says he uses jazz as a reference, but takes in the Cuban and African background which was itself an important influence on jazz musicians in the US. This live recording was made during the Munich Klaviersommer at the Bayerischer Hof Night Club, and includes well-known standards played Rubalcaba-style, as well as the pianists own compositions. He plays with Jeff Chambers (double bass) and Ignacio Berroa (drums).

programme.title: Honeywood
programme.desc: Jazz in Duketown is the largest free outdoor jazz festival in the Netherlands. Its a real gathering for jazz addicts, inviting internationally renowned artists. One of them is Dutch singer, pianist, composer and bandleader Ruben Hein. Widely praised for his warm and characteristic voice and his offbeat piano playing, Ruben Hein is the artistic director and conductor of the National Youth Jazz Orchestra (NJJO). At Jazz in Duketown he performs a jazzy set, accompanied by his 18 finest proteges.

programme.title: Stompin at the Savoy
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of Django, the Parisian New Morning Club pays tribute to the legendary guitarist Django Reinhardt. The program showcases the magic of Reinhardts compositions, as well as the virtuosity of one of his most famous heirs: Stochelo Rosenberg. With unbridled passion and enthusiasm, Rosenberg interprets the music that marked French musical heritage: gypsy jazz. Rosenberg cultivates an exceptional technique with a unique vibrato and sets an example for guitarists and other instrumentalists who aim to keep music alive. On stage at New Morning Club, Rosenberg is supported by Hono Winterstein (guitar), Mathias Levy (violin), Rocky Gresset (guitar), and Xavier Nikqi (double bass).

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Face au public
programme.desc: Legendary African-American folk singer Odetta (1930-2008) sang her spirituals with immeasurable sorrow and anguish. Her spiritual music expresses the horrific impact of slavery on millions of African people stolen from their homeland. For Odetta, folk music—be it spirituals, blues or field songs—was a vehicle for expressing the racism and injustice experienced by black people dating back to the days of slavery. This 1964 episode of Face au Public shows the melancholy of the era.

programme.title: Terrasson and Belmondo
programme.sub-title: Terrasson and Belmondo: À Nous Garo
programme.desc: Every year, the Jazz en Baie festival takes place in the beautiful bay of Mont Saint-Michel Todays broadcast shows a special gathering between two grandmasters of French jazz: pianist Jacky Terrasson and trumpeter Stephane Belmondo. The two team up for an amazing concert in which jazz is combined with soul and a touch of chanson française. The Franco-American pianist Terrasson delights in travelling the world, collaboration with others and leading his own trio, quartet, or quintet. With his long-time friend, Stephane Belmondo, Terrasson has produced wonderful CDs and beautiful concerts. One then finds the trumpeter on the pianists album Gouache; on another, the pianist guests on Belmondos Ever After. At the Jazz en Baie festival, the duo plays its amazing piano and trumpet music. Highly recommended!

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Club
programme.sub-title: North Sea Jazz Club: Marnix Busstra Band
programme.desc: Guitarist, composer and director Marnix Busstra loves crossing borders. He travels the world with his jazz bands, plays guitar and bouzouki, writes jazz and theatre-songs, and co-creates and directs the exuberant theatre shows of his wife, the Dutch diva Karin Bloemen. Busstra is a constant wheel of invention, with technique expanded by his creative urge to find something new, an evolving state that adds immeasurably to his art. The Marnix Busstra Band was founded in 2011 by its namesake. Joined by piano talent Rembrandt Frerichs, the ever creative double bassist Arnold Dooyeweerd and the inspirational force of drummer Pieter Bast, Busstra introduces a unique band that will definitely help broaden the jazz horizon. Marnix compositions are the starting point of the band. Musically, this band is a continuation of a development started by the quartet that Marnix co-leads with the renowned vibraphonist, Mike Mainieri. The result can best be described as lyrical, multifaceted jazz that centres around the profound interplay of the four musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Wynton Marsalis
programme.sub-title: Wynton Marsalis: In This House, on This Morning
programme.desc: The final concert of the Munchner Klaviersommer 1992 was by Wynton Marsalis and his septet. The 31-years-young star trumpeter performed one of his own jazz suites to the sold-out Philharmonie, under the title of In This House, On This Morning. The concert covers every jazz style, in composition and improvisation, and in both small and grand forms. Marsaliss Septet was made up of Wess Anderson (alto saxophone), Wycliffe Gordon (trombone), Reginald Veal (bass), Herlin Riley (drums), Todd Williams (tenor saxophone), and Eric Reed (piano).

programme.title: Agnes Gosling Quartet - InJazz 2019
programme.desc: Jazz festival slash conference inJazz brings together the supply and demand sides of the Dutch jazz scene, helping artists share knowledge and experiences and stimulating the development of international relationships. The conference program includes inspiring panel discussions, workshops, networking sessions and presentations. During the night, promising Dutch jazz acts as well as more seasoned groups hit the stage to show what theyre capable of. One of the artists performing at inJazz is Agnes Gosling. She has matured as a writer and arranger. The vocalist is unafraid to show her vulnerability. With her quartet, Gosling honors the tradition of great acoustic jazz while exploring new sounds and styles from the contemporary music world.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.sub-title: The Morgenland Festival: Needless to Say
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. Enjoy the musical wealth of the All Star Band in this episode of Morgenland Festival. Featuring graduate of the Boston Conservatory and vocalist Dima Oshno, both songs "Dream" and "Mugam" are played by the All Star Band and express a range of moods that vary from peaceful quietude to outbursts of energy.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Charles Lloyd Quartet live in Brussels
programme.desc: Since 1960, the legendary saxophonist Charles Lloyd has lent his adventurous, lyrical sound to collaborations with likes of Cannonball Adderley, Keith Jarrett and The Beach Boys. His early and highly successful experiments blending jazz and rock music charted a path that led to the electric fusion of Miles Davis and The Headhunters, while his exploration of spirituality and transcendental meditation added a new depth to his sound. Lloyd moves from hard swing to subtle ballads, blending gorgeous textures and Eastern influences. This 1966 recording features Lloyds quartet, accompanied by Keith Jarrett (piano), Cecil McBee (double bass) and Jack DeJohnette (drums), playing some of Lloyds own compositions.

programme.title: Where Are We Now - Set 2
programme.desc: German jazz and cabaret singer Atrin Madani was born in 1998 as the son of Iranian immigrants. In the face of pandemic uncertainty, geopolitical upheaval, and social unrest in his ancestral home country, Madani asked himself: where are we now? His response to this question is as clear and precise as his singing: what we need most right now is honesty, humility, and quality. All of these are abundantly present on the Berlin-based vocalists debut album. Inspired by the sound aesthetics of Mel Torme, Norah Jones, Diana Krall, and Till Bronner, Madani dedicates himself to a handpicked selection of songs that have so far remained largely unsung in jazz. At this festive album release concert at jazz club A-Trane Berlin in March 2023, Madani was accompanied by pianist Christian von der Goltz, guitarist Alexander RueSS, bassist Olaf Casimir, and drummer Sebastian Merk. Part II.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Moonlight Benjamin, blends together Voodoo blues, Haitian rock and Creole roll into a riff-heavy, groove-laden sonic concoction built on the tension between her powerful voice and saturated electric guitars.

programme.title: Aki Rissanen Trio at Jazzclub Unterfahrt, Munich
programme.desc: Aki Rissanens interest in jazz came after he started taking classical piano lessons. His deep interest in improvised music placed him among top jazz pianist in his home country - Finland. While composing and performing his own music, Rissanen has also collaborated with Verneri Pohjola and Dave Liebman, and today his name appears among the top European jazz musicians. Live from "Jazzclub Unterfahrt" in Munich, Germany, together with Antti Lotjonen on bass and Teppo Makynen on drums, Rissanen showcases the best of Scandinavian jazz and its DNA - the Nordic Tone.

programme.title: Come Twogether ft. Benjamin Herman
programme.desc: Instead of childrens songs, the sound of jazz standards was always present. They practiced intricate drum rhythms instead of Bach etudes: Simon Oslender and Jerôme Cardynaals have jazz running through their veins! Under the name "Twogether" both youngsters celebrate a very unique and soulful style of funky blues-jazz. They create a sound that leaves even renowned jazz artists speechless. The two, exceptionally talented boys met in a youth big band, and before long they became a musical team. Immediately after that, they won the first prize in the Prinses Christina Jazz Concours in Amsterdam, which got the whole thing started. In this concert, they perform with wonderful artists such as the Dutch saxophonist Benjamin Herman and the American vocalist Madeline Bell.

programme.title: The Mel Lewis Orchestra live at Estival Lugano
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The Mel Lewis Orchestra was arguably the most influential big band since the swing era. They were an unusual band, creating new styles, succeeding in an era when big bands were unpopular and remaining integrated during racially tense periods.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: TorTube
programme.desc: Jazz fans in television land have come to the right place for their dose of first-rate world jazz: TorTube! Jazz club De Tor in Enschede is one of Europes most authentic jazz venues, with an absolutely unique ambiance. Some of the best musicians from Holland and the rest of the world find their way to De Tor to perform for an appreciative audience of jazz fans. La Waltz 2, 3 and More is an episode of TorTube that pulls you into the world of De Tor. Veteran vocalist Humphrey Campbell shares the stage with chromatic harmonica player Hermine Deurloo for a unique mix of spectacular music.

programme.title: Kinda Dukish and Rockin in Rhythm
programme.desc: The Royal Concertgebouw in Amsterdam is a world-renowned concert hall, known for its first-rate acoustics. It has attracted many famous performers over the years and is one of the Netherlands most treasured musical institutions. On November 2, 1958, American jazz titan Duke Ellington and his Orchestra performed two concerts at the Concertgebouw in Amsterdam. Among the many talents in the Orchestra were trumpeter Clark Terry, trombonist Quentin Jackson, saxophonist Johnny Hodges and violinist Ray Nance.

programme.title: Visions of Music
programme.desc: Visions of Music - World Jazz invites the viewer on a journey to the roots of music, introducing the enormous impact that traditional music from around the world has had on contemporary jazz. This program features legendary musicians such as BB King, Dino Saluzzi, Tito Puente, Carlos Santana, Zawinul Joe, Manu Dibango, Abdullah Ibrahim, as well as new generation representatives such as Nicholas Payton, Cyro Baptista, and Don Byron. This episode of the Visions of Music series is about trumpet player Nicholas Payton, a dynamic performer who plays acoustic jazz and post-bop and enjoys going beyond the boundaries of traditional jazz. Considered by many to be one of the greatest artists of our time, Payton believes that the term "jazz" is old-fashioned and prefers to call it "Black American Music" (BAM). BAM combines spirituals, gospel, blues, jazz, and soul.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Kurt Rosenwinkel - Bandit 65
programme.desc: Jazzfest Bonn is an annual festival of modern and creative jazz music. Every May it presents local and international jazz musicians in concert halls all over the German city. Among the artists of the 2017 edition is Bandit 65, a trio of breathtaking virtuosity, great power, boundless breadth, and astounding beauty. Together with Tim Motzer on guitar and electronics, and Gintas Janusonis on drums and percussion, guitarist and band leader Kurt Rosenwinkel explores the intersection of guitars, rhythm, electronics, soundscapes, free improvisation, and telepathic interplay.

programme.title: Misc
programme.sub-title: Misc: Jerôme Beaulieu live in Montreal
programme.desc: Modern jazz with a twist, based on a group effort rather than on personal virtuosity: meet Misc! Composer and pianist Jerôme Beaulieu, double bassist Philippe Leduc and drummer William Côte met during their college years at the Universite de Montreal. Their Trio Jerôme Beaulieu quickly made a name for itself, winning the Montreal contest Jazz en Rafale and the Grand Prix du Festi-Jazz in Rimouski within the same year. Since their 2012 debut album Lhomme sur la lune was nominated for the Opus Prize for Jazz Album of the Year, the trio has been praised for its musical experiments and its contemporary jazz repertoire. The trios music boasts wide-ranging musical influences: from acoustic music enhanced with electronic rhythms and textures, to a palette of diverse textures accented with samples, eccentric percussion, effects and prepared instruments. With unabated musical enthusiasm yet under the new name Misc, the trio launched its self-titled third album in 2016.

programme.title: How Long Has This Been Going On?
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1980, American soul legend Ray Charles brought the Raelettes and the Ray Charles Orchestra to the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. With the full force of these two groups behind him, Charles showed why throughout his storied career he has been viewed as one of the most recognizable voices in music.

programme.title: I Want Your Love
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1980, American soul legend Ray Charles brought the Raelettes and the Ray Charles Orchestra to the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. With the full force of these two groups behind him, Charles showed why throughout his storied career he has been viewed as one of the most recognizable voices in music.

programme.title: Georgia on My Mind
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1980, American soul legend Ray Charles brought the Raelettes and the Ray Charles Orchestra to the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. With the full force of these two groups behind him, Charles showed why throughout his storied career he has been viewed as one of the most recognizable voices in music.

programme.title: Salif Keita and Les Ambassadeurs
programme.desc: Salif Keitas music is a rich combination of traditional Malian music with European and American influences. We can hear this in the instrumentation of Keitas music, which varies from traditional West-African instruments to Western European ones. The Malian singer was cast out by his family because of his albinism. In 1967 he moved to Bamako, where he started his musical career and joined Les Ambassadeurs (Internationaux). He achieved international acknowledgement with this band in the 1970s. After spending a couple of years in Ivory Coast, Salif has found his home base in Paris since 1984. During this 2010 concert, he proves to be rightfully referred to as "The Golden Voice of Africa".

programme.title: Kurhaus Scheveningen
programme.desc: The Dutch world-class jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats like Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson and John Clayton. From birth, Beets was surrounded by music: he heard classical music from his mother, who is a music pedagogue, and he heard jazz from his father, who has a great fan of Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey. Although Beets parents originally did not associate the word "musician" with the word "career", music is definitely in the familys blood. At this concert at the Kurhaus in Scheveningen, the Netherlands, Peter Beets teams up with the world-famous guitarist Kurt Rosenwinkel. With a career spanning almost twenty-five years and including collaborating with dynamic peers like Brad Mehldau, Brian Blade, Mark Turner, Joshua Redman, Chris Potter, as well as esteemed jazz legends like Joe Henderson, Paul Motian and Gary Burton, Rosenwinkels indelible mark in music is the consummation of being steeped in the rich and deep traditions of jazz, springing off of the shoulders of such vital underpinnings to elevate his own art to new heights, evolving the language in a way no other guitarist has since his arrival. This collaboration between Beets and Rosenwinkel guarantees brilliant music.

programme.title: Michel Legrand Orchestra at Spa, 1982
programme.desc: Known outside jazz circles mainly for his film scores, French composer, arranger and pianist Michel Legrand has had a long and storied career in music. Interpreters of his compositions include jazz legends such as Sarah Vaughan, Stan Getz, and Bill Evans, as well as pop stars such as Barbra Streisand and Frank Sinatra. During this 1982 performance in the Belgian town of Spa, Legrand leads his orchestra through a number of original songs, including "The Summer Knows," "What Are You Doing the Rest of Your Life?" and "Les Moulins de mon Cœur." Singing either in English or French, Legrand delivers a spirited performance with plenty of romantic flair that is sure to capture your heart.

programme.title: Live at the Metro Theatre
programme.desc: Angus and Julia Stone are an Australian brother-sister folk-blues group which formed in 2006. Their parents played as a folk duo before Julia and Angus were born. Angus and Julia Stone have released two studio albums, A Book Like This (8 September 2007), which peaked at No. 6 on the ARIA Albums Chart; and Down. Here they perform at The Metro Theatre, in Sydney, Australia, on October 10, 2007.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: Children of the Night
programme.desc: Estival Jazz Lugano is an annual, open-air music festival that takes place over five days in the picturesque city of Lugano, Switzerland. Since 1979, this musical Mecca has been a must-attend event for all jazz and world music fans worldwide. In July 1996, renowned American saxophonist Wayne Shorter and his quintet performed at Estival Jazz Lugano. Together with pianist Jim Beard, guitarist David Gilmore, bassist Alphonso Johnson, and drummer Rodney van Holmes, Shorter shows he is still at his best.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Paï
programme.desc: Recorded in 1971 in Paris, France, Brazilian, classically trained bossa nova guitarist Baden Powell and his quartet play Pai, Lotus (written by Baden Powell), Tristeza (by Haroldo Lobo/Niltinho), Round Midnight (by Thelonious Monk), Nega do cabelo duro (by David Nasser/Rubens Soares), and Aos pes da cruz (by Ze da Zilda/Marino Pinto). Powell is joined by Ernesto Ribeiro-Gonçalves on double bass, Helio Schiavo on drums, and Alfredo Bessa on percussion.

programme.title: Jammin at Home
programme.desc: In 1988, Dee Dee Bridgewater was one of the first great jazz singers to perform at the Jazz Festival in Ramatuelle. In 2016, the story seems to repeat itself as her daughter China Moses took the stage at Ramatuelle. Over the years, China Moses has become a mature performer with a unique style: rocky voice, sharp sense of swing, and intense/energetic stage presence. After signing compilations dedicated to Dinah Washington and blues, Moses released in 2016 an album of his own compositions, entitled "Whatever". Get ready for a most entertaining performance combining jazz, soul, and hip-hop.

programme.title: Buana
programme.desc: This broadcast shows a rare appearance at the 1996 Germeringer Jazztage by the legendary flamenco guitarist Paco de Lucía and his sextet. Some may question the inclusion of a flamenco guitarist within a jazz festival. However, the similarities between flamenco and blues have been well documented: both are the outlet for a poor, disenfranchised minority, with a primitive strength, boundless capabilities for improvisation and a requirement for breathtaking virtuosity - all qualities shown by Paco de Lucía in this performance. Moreover, he has long been experimenting with jazz forms (evident even from his inclusion of bass, drums, and saxophone in his sextet), while still retaining the essence of the flamenco tradition. In his own words: "What I have tried to do is have a hand holding onto tradition and the other scratching, digging in other places trying to find new things I can bring into flamenco".

programme.title: Starlight
programme.desc: "Munchner Klaviersommer" was an annual concerts series that took place from 1981 to 1998 in Munich, Germany. Although the festivals name suggests a strong focus on piano music, it featured countless famous musicians from jazz and classical music - not just pianists. The concerts were usually held in July at The Gasteig, home of the Munich Philharmonic. In 1987, American pianist Armando Anthony "Chick" Corea was one of the artists appearing here. Together with Frank Gambale on guitar, Eric Marienthal on saxophone, John Patitucci on bass and Dave Weckl on drums, Corea performed jazz fusion with his Elektric Band - a jazz subgenre inspired by the rock music and electronic instruments of the day. The band was nominated for two Grammy Awards.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Stingray PausePlay
programme.desc: We Pause and chat with local and international artists to get an in-depth look at their lives and music, they Play some amazing music in these, one-of-a-kind, live sessions! These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: Sarah Vaughan Live in 58 and 64
programme.sub-title: Sarah Vaughan Live in 58 and 64: The Divine One
programme.desc: Sarah Vaughan: Live in 58 and 64 features the "Divine One" in her prime, wrapping her sultry voice around jazz standards such as Lover Man, "Misty" and "I Got Rhythm" and soaring on popular showtunes such as "Over The Rainbow" and Maria. One of the greatest voices of the 20th Century, her renditions of songs by Harold Arlen, Leonard Bernstein, Johnny Burke, the Gershwins and Stephen Sondheim are pure diva magic. These three performances demonstrate why Sarah Vaughan is invariably mentioned in the same breath as Ella Fitzgerald and Billie Holiday.

programme.title: Midwichi kaod
programme.desc: Amrita kadumist uurides seatakse Pauli kiindumus Nathanivastu kahtluse alla. Susannah puuab mõista laste vagivaldsete instinktide põhjust. Lapsed naevad Susannat nuud ohuna ja kasutavad oma jõudu tema neutraliseerimiseks.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Miami CSI meeskonda juhib pommiekspert Horatio Caine. Temaga koos teostavad uurimisi ballistik ja relvaekspert Calleigh Duquesne ja raamatukoi Tim Speedle, kes tunneb Miami tanavaid nagu oma taskuid. Lisaks aitavad neid DNA spetsialist Alexx Woods ja sukelduja Eric Delko. See viisik toob alati tõe kuritegude kohta paevavalgele.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Sidney paastab oma kihelkonna liikme põlevast majast, kuid peagi parast seda pussitatakse tema mees aias surnuks. Sidney ja Geordie avastavad, et mõlemad vahejuhtumid on seotud homode salajaste kogunemistega. Geordie vaikesel lapsel diagnoositakse haigus, mis võib lõppeda surmaga.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Sidney ja Geordie kutsutakse Londoni džassiklubisse, mille omanik on Jenniferi kallima isa. Kui kallima õde mõrvatakse, viivad juhtniidid mõrvani, mille politsei on aastate eest kinni matsinud.

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adrian Monk on geniaalne San Francisco politseiuurija, kes tegutseb nuud politsei erakonsultandina. Olles oma toos vaga hea, on ta samas ka veidrik, kes kannatab obsessiiv-kompulsiivse haire all. Ta on ettearvamatu ja impulsiivne inimene, kuidi samas ei jaa tal ukski asi kahe silma vahele, mis teebki temast politsei raudvara.

programme.title: NCIS

programme.desc: Naine, kes kahtlustab, et tema kihlatu petab teda, palkab Marissa. Probleem on aga selles, et mees on tema endine elukaaslane Martin Simard.

programme.title: Midwichi kaod
programme.desc: Kui Susannah on tõrjutud, tugevneb laste haare Midwichi ule. Kui Paul markab laste tõelist olemust, anub ta Susannat, et too prooviks nendega vaherahu sõlmida. Jarjekordne ime aneb Zoe ja Sami tegutsema.

programme.title: Midwichi kaod
programme.desc: Kaks aastat hiljem. Lapsed avaldavad soovi Midwichist lahkuda ja Susannah kahtlustab tagamõtet. Üht perekonda tabab tragoodia. Paul ja Susannah teevad koostood, et tõde paljastada.

programme.title: Midwichi kaod
programme.desc: Parast suuremat verevalamist plaanivad lapsed lahkuda. Susannah laheb nendega vabatahtlikult kaasa ja puuab Cassie ohutusse kohta viia. Nuud on selge, et nad tuleb peatada. Ja lihtsat valjapaasu pole.

programme.desc: Miami CSI meeskonda juhib pommiekspert Horatio Caine. programme.title: Ma naen su haalt
programme.desc: Kuum telesõu pakub põnevust, ara arvamise hasarti, ullatusi ja ohtralt huumorit ning meelelahutust. Saates osaleval arvajapaaril tuleb seitsme tundmatu seast eristada imelise lauluoskusega inimesed andekatest teesklejatest, kes aga uldse laulda ei oska. Arvajatele on abiks nõunikekogu, kuhu kuuluvad armastatud Eesti naitlejad, lauljad ja meelelahutajad Evelin Võigemast, Grete Kuld, Andrei Zevakin ja Estoni Kohver. Kulalisnõunikuna astub ules muusikamaailmas nii jazz-, eksperimentaal- kui popartistina edukalt figureerinud lauljanna Laura Põldvere. Saadet juhib Piret Laos.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Omanaoline kohtingusaade, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Basseinipidu toob villasse ootamatu poorde. Kohale saabuvad Austraalia sekspommid Aaron ja Jessie.

programme.title: Valentinipaev veiniistanduses
programme.desc: Meil on kolmandat korda võimalus kaasa elada Frankie ja Natei armastuse loole. Seekord puuavad nad korraldada oma elu viinamarjaistanduses ja peavad salaja abiellumisplaani.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: "Toidu ABC" jatkab oma ulesannet uurida valja põnevaid toidufakte ja lukata umber muute. Sellel nadalal suundub Helen uhte maailma suurimatest kohvivabrikutest, et saada teada, mis annab lahustuvale cappuccinole vahu; Matt uurib Napolis, miks on enamik konservtomatitest parit Itaaliast; ja Kate on Euroopas panettonei odusseial, et selgitada valja, kuidas see kohev maius nii kaua varske pusib.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: "Toidu ABC" otsib vasimatult tõde sinu poekarus oleva toidu kohta. Selles saates selgitab Matt valja, kui palju on sinu vorstis liha ning kuidas Briti banger-vorstid endale nime said; Kate uurib, kust on uusim sõna veinimaailmas, oranž vein, oma varvi saanud; ning Amanda avastab kõrgtehnoloogilise lahenduse taiuslike miljonari-koogikeste viilude lõikamiseks.

programme.title: Rita kook
programme.desc: Sel nadalal astub Rita kooki Stockmanni kaubamaja lihameister Janek Joona, kes teeb puust ja punaseks, kuidas valida ning valmistada erinevat liha nii, et see oleks uhtviisi suus sulav ning ka tervislik. Lihasaatest saad teada, kuidas teha maailma parimat supipuljongit ning valmistada sellest tõeliselt hõrk kanasupp. Kuid mitte ainult: Rita ja Janek teevad ka veise antrekoodist perfektse steigi, millega loob pahviks ka kõige pirtsakamad gurmaanid.

programme.title: Mitme naoga Eesti
programme.desc: Saatejuht Juri peab maha uhe korraliku grillpeo koos Peruust parit Tony ja Hispaaniast parit Amaiaga! Peruus on kombeks grillida merisiga, Hispaanias pannakse lauale lehmakeel tomatises kastmes - milline neist omaparastest roogadest jõuab saates grillile, selgub erinevaid kultuure tutvustava "Mitme naoga Eesti" lõbusas uues episoodis.

programme.title: Esmakohtingute hotell
programme.desc: 26-aastane Laker otsib oskuslikku kaaslast, nii et maailmarekordi omanik Alex võib talle tapselt õige olla. Pensioneerunud õpetaja Edward otsib kaasat, kellega koos tantsupõrandaid vallutada. Siidimeister Duncan tutvub kuunlameister Richardiga ning nende kahe ebahariliku meistri vahel tekib tõeline sara.

programme.title: Esmakohtingute hotell
programme.desc: Cambridgei ulikoolis tootav Michael otsib endale andekat ja intelligentset kaaslast. 55-aastane abiõpetaja Maroulla loodab leida endale enesekindla mehe, kes suudab teda naerma ajada. Itaallannast varbamisspetsialist Francesca unistab mehest, kes tooks valja tema haavatavama poole ning elektrik Alex paistab selleks igati potentsiaalikas kandidaat olevat.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Kaes on emotsionaalne õhtu 16 imelise naise jaoks, kes kohtuvad omavahel ja Joeyga esimest korda parast võtteperioodi lõppu. Avaldatakse Kelsey A sõnumi tahendus ning roositseremoonia otsustab, kes saab Joey perega kohtuda.

programme.title: Armastuse mehaanika
programme.desc: Oma õe pulma tulles kohtub Matti vana kallimaga, kes tootab isa mehaanikatookojas. Selgub, et leek pole lõplikult kustunud ning naine on nuud kahevahel - kas naasta suurlinna, kus teda ootab ta kihlatu Devin, või jaada siia.

programme.title: Luba abielluda
programme.desc: Romantiline hittkomoodia! Kirikuõpetaja Frank otsustab abielluda sooviva noorpaari suhted proovile panna. Ta korraldab armunutele põrgulikud katsed, nii et uhel hetkel pole neile endalegi enam selge, kas nad rohkem armastavad või vihkavad teineteist. Planeeritud pulmapaev laheneb aga katastroofilise kiirusega...

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: "Toidu ABC" on missioonil, et selgitada valja saladused toidu taga me taldrikutel. Selles osas selgitab Jimmy Doherty Tais valja, kuidas banaanipuu õis me kartulitega krõbekalarooga rikastab. Matt Tebbutt uurib Hispaanias, kuidas jõuavad vaarikad põllult me kulmkappi ilma lodiks muutumata. Ja Andi Oliver suundub sibulavabrikusse, et naha, kuidas seal neid pisarakiskujatest koogivilju kooritakse.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: Jatkub "Toidu ABC" ristikaik, et suurendada me teadlikkust meie toidulauast. Selles saates puuab Jimmy Doherty Tais aru saada, miks on koriander mõnede inimeste lemmik, samas kui teiste jaoks maitseb nagu seep. Matt Tebbutt saab Hispaanias teada, miks on vahel apelsine nii raske koorida ja Briony Williams satub pigisse, uurides kusimust, miks kukub võileib põrandale alati vale kuljega allpool.

programme.title: Minu kook on parim
programme.desc: Melbourneis toimub lahing OG vs Gate Crashers, kuna majakaaslased Nick ja Christian loodavad end oma kodurestoranis "3181" teise kokkamisega lunastada.

programme.title: Sandhamni mõrvad
programme.desc: Tunnustatud krimikirjanik murgitatakse oma kodus, umbritsetuna erinevatest kulalistest. Ühel kahtlusalusel on Noraga murettekitav side.

programme.desc: Inimeste varbamine Katariina missiooni taitmiseks on aega nõudev. Keiser aga kingib Katariinale uue "sõbra".

programme.desc: Õukonnaintriigide lõksu langenud Katariina otsib neist valjapaasu.

programme.desc: Saarelised mangivad lõkke umber, kuid villas ahvardavad tundeleegid lõõmama luua.

programme.desc: Tunnustatud krimikirjanik murgitatakse oma kodus, umbritsetuna erinevatest kulalistest. Ühel kahtlusalusel on Noraga murettekitav side.

programme.title: Majajahtijad
programme.desc: Kaks Chicago juristi on just valja kolimas oma vanematekodudest ja otsimas uhist arusaamist sisekujunduse osas.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Pireti ja Voltsi pulmakutse tekitab saajates palju elevust, mõnes ka pettumust ja ootamatut segadust. Mari soosiv suhtumine Riinasse põhjustab pingeid nii tool kui kodus. Piret muretseb nii pulmade kui Voltsi tervise parast. Kertu kohtub Erikuga. Liinal on Andresele uudiseid. Gunnar tahab alustada puhtalt lehelt.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Toimuvad donja Francisca matused. Meliton ja Onesimo paastavad don Amancio. Antonia otsustab ara sõita.

programme.title: Esmakohtingute hotell
programme.desc: Cambridgei ulikoolis tootav Michael otsib endale andekat ja intelligentset kaaslast. 55-aastane abiõpetaja Maroulla loodab leida endale enesekindla mehe, kes suudab teda naerma ajada. Itaallannast varbamisspetsialist Francesca unistab mehest, kes tooks valja tema haavatavama poole ning elektrik Alex paistab selleks igati potentsiaalikas kandidaat olevat.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Marilyn avaldab oma tundeid. Sonny libastub kogemata. Kas Irenei muurid loovad uldse kunagi kõikuma?

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Osher saabub uudisega, et iga poiss on kutsunud kolm tudrukut vaga erilisele grupikohtingule, kus Cali Beach Clubis uhineb nendega kallim.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Parast kolme miljoni dollari võitmist saab kolmeliikmeline pere viimaks võimaluse kolida uhetoalisest uurikorterist oma unistuste majja Missouris.

programme.title: Unelmate hotell
programme.desc: Markus suundub valenime all endale kuuluvasse hotelli Brasiilias, et vargustes ja hamarates tegudes selgust saada. Tutar Leonie on skeptiline. Samas paigas veedab koos pojaga puhkust tuntud kirjanik Sarah. Pojale ei meeldi, et ema pidevalt raamatu kallal nokitseb. Pensionaridest Henriette ja Leopold seevastu naudivad mõnusat aega taiel rinnal. Millised plaanid on aga Leopoldi pojal Gotzil, kes samuti Brasiiliasse saabub?

programme.title: Sademed Brooklyni kohal
programme.desc: Kokana tootav uksikema Lidia tulevikuunelmad varisevad kokku, kui arrogantne tehnoloogiasektori ettevõtja Danny ostab ara tema perele kuulnud restorani, et seal oma plaane ellu viia.

programme.title: Sõbrad
programme.desc: Phoebe avastab plaadifirma, kes tahab "Rapakassi" valja anda. Joey koliks Chandleri juurde tagasi, aga Chandleril on juba uus toakaaslane...

programme.title: Reede ÕHTU!
programme.desc: Manguline "Reede Õhtu!" esitab saatejuhtidele ja saatekulalistele humoorikaid ja lõbusaid valjakutseid. Võisteldakse heategevuse nimel ja saate võitja saab võimaluse annetada endale sudamelahedasele heategevusorganisatsioonile. Seekordses vastasseisus on Mart Kivastiku filmi "Taevatrepp" naitlejad Mait Malmsten ja Hannes Hermakula.

programme.title: Esmakohtingute hotell
programme.desc: Oxfordi matemaatikauliõpilane Tom on hea kuulaja ja leiab endale potentsiaalse kaaslase filosoofiat õppinud Natalie naol. Juuksurisalongi omanik Chris unistab pere loomisest. Õhtujuht Elissa ja amatoornaitleja Robi vahel tekib tõeline sade.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Sonny teele tuleb takistus. Theo markab midagi vapustavat. Kirby nõuab sisse suure teene.

programme.title: Armastuse hind
programme.desc: Feriti ema Gulgun suhtub Seyranisse vaga hasti. Ta toetab Seyrani soovi minna ulikooli õppima, mis on Seyranile suureks kergenduseks, sest ta arvas, et tal tuleb oma tulevikuplaanid maha matta. Seyrani suhtumine Feritisse muutub, kui ta saab teada, et ka Ferit ei abiellu oma vabal tahtel. Kõik Seyrani kodus on nukrad, et Seyran lahkub kodust oodatust varem. Seyrani vanatadile Hattucile meenub oma ootamatu lõpuga armulugu.

programme.title: Kodud rahaks
programme.desc: Tanases saates oleme Tallinna kulje all Peetris, kus sisustusvaljakutse võtab vastu praktilisi lahendusi kõrgelt hindav korteriomanik Madis. Kui mees ise on valinud sisekujunduselemendiks pappkastile asetatud lõikelaua, on ilmselge, et saatejuht Keili Sukijaineni ja sisekujundusentusiast Merlin Miido head nõu on juba vaga vaja.

programme.title: Haide keskel
programme.desc: Lõpuks ometi kannavad Lou tehtud uletunnid viljakaid tulemusi; oodatud jõudude liikumine ei lahe plaaniparaselt; kuigi Lou taht tõuseb, ei lahe tema tookaaslastel asjad nii hasti.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Soome versioon omanaolisest kohtingusaatest, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Mida vanemad sulle ei raakinud
programme.desc: Ülipõnev, paljastav ja vaatemanguline saade, mis õpetab rindasid armastama. Saame teada, mis on rinnaorgasm, milline on elu suurte, vaikeste ja kunstrindadega. Epp Karsini juhtimisel seletame lahti, miks just rinnad armastuses maailma naba on.

programme.title: Vallalised lembelaeval
programme.desc: Rebecca Romijn ja Jerry OConnell tervitavad luksuslikul kruiisilaeval 12 vallalist, kes kõik on tulnud eesmargiga leida endale tõeline armastus. Osalejad pannakse kohe proovile talendishowga, kus erikulaliseks on Ted Lange.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Armastuse Saare temperatuur tõuseb metsiku hooga.

programme.title: Majajahtijad
programme.desc: Chicago pere otsib maja, millest kujundada oma pere unistuste kodu, kuid see, mida nad naevad, võtab neilgi karbi lahti.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Piret on Haapsalus ja saab Sirjelt kõva kriitikat. Indrek ei suuda mõista, miks Mari teeb Riinale erandeid. Andrese ja Kertu vahel on pingeid, mida Erik kavatseb ara kasutada. Gunnar ja Sirje leiavad ootamatult uue ariidee. Saabuvad Voltsi analuuside vastused.

programme.title: Spiraal
programme.desc: Õudusfilm! Sadistlik geenius vallandab haiglase õigusemõistmise, mis on filmiseeria "Saag" uus hirmuaratav peatukk. Lugupeetud veteranpolitseiniku varjus tootav ninakas uurija Ezekiel "Zeke" Banks ja tema kollanokast paarimees hakkavad uurima koletuid mõrvu, mis meenutavad jubedust tekitavalt linna võigast minevikku. Jarjest suveneva musteeriumi sisse tahtmatult lõksu jaanud Zeke on akitselt otse keset tapja haiglast mangu.

programme.title: Suvereporter+
programme.desc: Sadagu vihma või siragu paike! Suvereporter toob televaatajani kõige olulisemad uudised ja mahlakamad palad erinevaist paigust, nii maalt kui merelt, festivalidelt ja sundmustelt.

programme.title: Kaks kanget Lõuna-Ameerikas
programme.desc: Kahe sõbra suur seiklus jatkub! Kristjan on Peruu pealinnas Limas, kus tutvub rannaeluga ja rahvussoogiga. Teet kulastab erakordseid saari, mis koosnevad linnuvaljaheidetest ja lindudest ning tutvub ka kohaliku viina tegemisega.

programme.title: Tipptund 2
programme.desc: Mollukomoodia teises filmis peavad Hongkongi politseinik Lee (Jackie Chan) ja tema jankist kolleeg Carter (Chris Tucker) kinni nabima uliohtliku kurjategija. Mehed loodavad Hongkongis korralikult valja puhata, aga paraku langeb juba esimesel õhtul nende õlule ulesanne, mis viib nad Los Angelese agulitesse ja Las Vegase tuledesarasse. Kõik selleks, et tabada kurikuulus maffiaboss ja tema surmavalt kaunis kaaslanna.

programme.title: Spiraal
programme.desc: Õudusfilm! Sadistlik geenius vallandab haiglase õigusemõistmise, mis on filmiseeria "Saag" uus hirmuaratav peatukk. Lugupeetud veteranpolitseiniku varjus tootav ninakas uurija Ezekiel "Zeke" Banks ja tema kollanokast paarimees hakkavad uurima koletuid mõrvu, mis meenutavad jubedust tekitavalt linna võigast minevikku. Jarjest suveneva musteeriumi sisse tahtmatult lõksu jaanud Zeke on akitselt otse keset tapja haiglast mangu.

programme.title: Mõistatustekutid
programme.desc: Josh Gates saadab Jessica Choboti ja Phil Torrese Kambodžasse, et nad ajaks ule kahemeetrise ahvmehe jalgi, keda kohalikud huuavad Tek Tekiks.

programme.title: Mõistatustekutid
programme.desc: Josh Gates saadab Jessica Choboti ja Phil Torrese Mexico Citysse, et nad uuriks, miks on seal teatatud ebanormaalselt palju paranormaalsetest nahtustest.

programme.title: NASA mõistatused
programme.desc: Apollo 12 astronaudid toovad kuult tagasi midagi elusat. NASA teeb maale lahenevat asteroidi jalgides ootamatu avastuse: tegu ei ole asteroidi vaid maavalise eluga.

programme.title: Krimi
programme.desc: Politseisaade.

programme.title: Suvereporter+
programme.desc: Sadagu vihma või siragu paike! Suvereporter toob televaatajani kõige olulisemad uudised ja mahlakamad palad erinevaist paigust, nii maalt kui merelt, festivalidelt ja sundmustelt.

programme.title: Kas loome kaed?
programme.desc: Aastakumneid maailmas populaarsust kogunud telemang nuud Eestis! Tõeline telemangude klassika, kus mangus osalejal ei ole vaja malumangu teadmisi või fuusilisi oskuseid. Mang kaib raha ja auhindade peale. On vaja vaid natukene õnne, et teha õige otsus! Kas valida saatejuhi poolt pakutav rahasumma või salaparane kingitus? Kas jaada oma otsusele kindlaks või proovida oma õnne veelgi suurema võidu nimel? "Kas loome kaed?" kusib alati rõõmsameelne ja šarmantne saatejuht Robert Rool.

programme.title: Kaks kanget Lõuna-Ameerikas
programme.desc: Teet lendab Peruus kuulsate Nasca jooniste kohal. Kristjan lahkub Peruust ja siseneb uhe ebahariliku piiripunkti kaudu Boliiviasse. Teet alustab oma reisi uht oodatuimat matka - 4 paeva pikkust Inca Traili.

programme.title: Grand Tour
programme.desc: Jeremy, Richard ja James suunduvad Detroiti ka asuvad motolinna endisaegset hiilgust taastama. Linnasudames, vanas Cadillaci tehases ja lennuvaljal teeb kolmik lõplikult selgeks, milline on parim ikooniks saanud muskelauto labi aegade.

programme.title: New Yorgi mõrvad
programme.desc: Kui Brighton Beachil jaab kadunuks Ukraina immigrant, teevad NYPD, USA prokuratuur ja FBI parimad agendid koostood, et valja selgitada, mis juhtus.

programme.title: Tapja motiiv
programme.desc: Parast seda, kui Texase jarvest leitakse surnuna noor naine, hakkavad uurijad jalitama jooksus olevat tapjat.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Enam kui 500 Florida erikoolis õppinud meest raagivad peksust ja seksuaalsest vaarkohtlemisest, mis neile seal osaks sai. Ning on ka neid, kes vaidavad, et koolis oli õpilasi tapetud. Uurijad paljastavad kooli hairiva parandi ja kujuteldamatuid tõdesid.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Kaks meest mõistetakse suudi 10-aastase Jeanine Nicarico roovimises ja tapmises ning mõistetakse surma. Mõlemad aga eitavad vankumatult oma suud ning algab võidujooks tegeliku tapja leidmiseks, enne kui hukkamiskuupaev paika panna jõutakse.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: 2003. aastal kaob New Yorgi finantsanaluutik Maria Cruz ja lisaks ka mees, kes temaga viimati kohtus. Vanity Fairi erikorrespondent Bryan Burrough liigub selle juhtumi jalgi ajades Manhattanist Newarkini, paljastades loo ravimipettustest, varastatud uimastitest ja kirjeldamatutest kuritegudest.

programme.title: Palgamõrv
programme.desc: Politseisse poordub naine, kellelt uks professionaalne trummar on palunud, et ta tapaks ara tema partneri, kelle osas jaab ebaselgeks, kas jutt kaib mehe abikaasast või armukesest. Kas politsei saab asjast sotti aegsasti, et jõuda naine paasta?

programme.title: Palgamõrv
programme.desc: Rahaahne naine palub mitut võõrast inimest, et need ta mehe ara tapaksid. Sužee hargneb lahti sarnaselt Hollywoodi põnevikule, politsei on tema võika plaani iga etapi ules filminud.

programme.title: Grand Tour
programme.desc: Kolmik võtab isehakanud loodusfotograafidena ette autoretke labi Colombia metsiku looduse. Kõik nad ilmuvad kohale autos, mida peavad ulesande taitmiseks kõige sobivamaks - Clarkson valis selleks Jeep Wrangleri, May Fiat Panda 4x4 Sisley ja Hammond Chevrolet pikapi.

programme.title: Tipptund 3
programme.desc: Uurija Carter (Chris Tucker) ja inspektor Lee (Jackie Chan) tegutsevad jalle, sedapuhku aga Pariisis. Meeste missiooniks on nurjata ulemaailmne kuritegelik vandenõu ja paasta vana sõbra elu. Asja segavateks faktoriteks on aga nimelt tõsiasjad, et mehed ei oska ei kohalikku keelt, ei tunne linna ja veel vahem on neil aimu pariislaste igapaevakommetest.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Kui Lou Pearlman, mees The Backstreet Boysi ja NSYNCi taga, põgeneb riigist, algatavad ametivõimud rahvusvahelise inimjahi ning Vanity Fairi erikorrespondent Bryan Burrough paljastab sunged saladused, mille eest ta jooksus on.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Rocknrolli hulluks geeniuseks peetaval Phil Spectoril oli nõrkus tulirelvade vastu. Kui politsei ta haarberisse kutsutakse, leiavad nad seal naisterahva surnukeha ja enesevalitsuse kaotanud muusikalegendi. Kes vajutas paastikule ja miks?

programme.title: Rikas Eesti
programme.desc: Rikas Eesti tanase osa peategelaseks on Jose, kes on sundinud ja kasvanud Mexico Citys. Keset paneelmaju ja asfaltteid ules kasvanud mehhiklane ei ole seetõttu kunagi eestlastele omaseid talutoid nainud, proovinud ega isegi neist kuulnud. Ka loomade karjatamine ja nende keskel olemine on tema jaoks midagi teisest maailmast. Juri viibki Jose alpakafarmi, kus tuleb silmitsi seista nii puhtamate- kui mustemate talutoodega.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Korrumpeerunud politseinikud muuvad konfiskeeritud narkootikume ja lavastavad suudi oma noore ametivenna, kes on sunnitud meedia tahelepanu võitmiseks ja oma suutuse tõestamiseks pantvange võtma. Cage ja Sydney meenutavad oma esimest suudlust.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Walker avastab preeriakaitsealalt salajase narkolabori, kus valmistatakse surmavat uimastit ,,Valge puhvel". Gage proovib laborisse toole saada, et suutõendeid koguda ja kurjategijad paljastada. Alex ja Sydney leiavad ules uimastitootjate peidupaiga ja Sydney saab haavata.

programme.desc: Kell on saanud seitse ja on aeg paeva kõige tahtsamateks uudisteks meilt ning mujalt maailmast. Kaadrid sundmuse keskel, intervjuud otsustajatelt ja lood, mis kõnetavad kõiki. programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Kell on saanud seitse ja on aeg paeva kõige tahtsamateks uudisteks meilt ning mujalt maailmast. Kaadrid sundmuse keskel, intervjuud otsustajatelt ja lood, mis kõnetavad kõiki. programme.title: Bioloogia kursus
programme.desc: Jack uritab saada tookaaslastega lahedasemaks ja kutsub nad manguõhtule. Helen aitab direktor Durbinil selgroogu kasvatada. Stef ja Mary puuavad Michelleist valja meelitada teavet kohtuprotsessi kohta, milles ta oli vandekohtunik.

programme.title: Bioloogia kursus
programme.desc: Kui õpilased viivad Jacki kokku oma kõlvatu isaga, kavandab Jack kattemaksu, puudes oma vaidetavalt uueks inimesed saanud isa paljastada. Nõid ennustab Maryle, Stefile ja Michelleile sunget tulevikku, mis lõhestab naisi.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz, kes hakkab abielluma Wesleyga, usub, et on leidnud oma ideaalse mehe. Jack peab langetama otsuse, kui Nancy kohtub Averyga. Kenneth vallandatakse, kui ta puuab edutamist valtida ja Jenna poiss-sõber muutub Cheri jaljendajaks.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: TGS-i viienda hooaja alguses peavad Liz ja Carol oma suhetele silma vaatama, Jack ja Avery võitlevad kodu kujundamise ule, Jenna saab TGS-i produtsendiks ja Tracy peab hakkama saadma eluga 30 Rockis ilma Kennethita.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz saab teada, et uks monteerija levitab tema kohta kuulujutte, Jack hakkab oma sundimata pojale nõuandevideoid salvestama, Tracy astub samme, et olla oma tutre sunni juures ja Kenneth puuab tõestada, et tal on eesmark.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Sketšikomoodia "TGS koos Tracy Jordaniga" peastsenarist Liz Lemon peab hakkama saama uue ulbe ulemuse ja hullumeelse uue staariga, puudes juhtida edukat telesaadet mõistust kaotamata.
